title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Springfield Armory National Historic Site has a wealth of historic resources including museum objects, archives, and an amazing collection of historic photos. NPS Photo   Â    Looking for more information?  News Browse press releases, subscribe to updates and dig into archived news.   Photos and Multimedia Experience the park from afar! Check out our photo galleries!    History & Culture Learn more about the historic people, places, and museum collection that make Springfield Armory special.    Nature Did you know the history of Springfield Armory includes dinosaurs?   Education Bring Springfield Armory to the classroom.   Kids & Youth Learn how to become a junior ranger; look for youth events and activities.   Management Learn about the laws and policies that drive Springfield Armory National Historic Site.
